# kCISamplerAffineMatrix

**Global Variable**

The key for an affine matrix. The associated value is an `NSArray` object ([*a b c d tx ty*]) that defines the transformation to apply to the sampler.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCISamplerAffineMatrix: String
```

## Constants

- **kCISamplerWrapMode**: The key for the sampler wrap mode. The wrap mode specifies how Core Image produces pixels that are outside the extent of the sample. Possible values are [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerWrapBlack] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerWrapClamp].
- **kCISamplerFilterMode**: The key for the filtering to use when sampling the image. Possible values are [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerFilterNearest] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerFilterLinear].
- **kCISamplerColorSpace**: The key for the color space to use when sampling the image.
